alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 4:08PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches late tonight through the day Monday, with another 1 to 2 inches possible Monday night through the day Tuesday. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Walworth and Edmunds Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional light to occasionally moderate snow is expected on Monday night into Tuesday, with a couple of inches of additional snowfall accumulation possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
